code: const fetchNewsApiData=async url=>{const response=await fetch(url);if(!response.ok){throw new Error("HTTP error. Status: ".concat(response.status));}return response.json();};const reshapeNewsApiData=data=>{return{news:data.articles};};const getNewsApiData=async name=>{try{const data=await fetchNewsApiData("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/news_api/").concat(name));return reshapeNewsApiData(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);return{news:{},error:true,errorMessage:error.message};};};export default getNewsApiData;
